title: A 'certain' group of Chinese premades
body:
Just came across a group of Chinese premades (on ARAM) who were blatantly overconfident, it was a 5v4 since their Anivia disconnected but it was still somewhat a close game(ish). The only thing was, was that at the end, I'd be soloing the Nexus 3 times or so since the 4 of them just run into fountain and die so they can 'restart' the fights which we will only just barely win due to me spamming W in teamfights as Sona. The last time I had to solo the Nexus, I did manage to kill it, even the Nexus explosion animation played, but it wasn't in time for the 4 man premade surrender and despite the enemy Nexus explosion animation already played and gone, our Nexus still played its animation, exploded and we got a Defeat.

I really don't understand the mentalities of these Chinese premades being so over-confident and doing such a thing. They all had ranked borders above Silver whereas I was unranked, I told them how I thought they were good due to their borders, and that as the only unranked player on the team, I should be the 'bottom line' and nobody should be worse than me, and they begin to (using very broken English and a fine mixture of Chinese 'pinyin') mock me by saying how I'm Silver/Gold+ and how they're gonna report me for 'trying to push' for the win.

I honestly will never understand these Chinese people...one more reason to hate being mistakened for one...
